briefTitle: Adapalene-BPO Gel Associated With Doxycycline Hyclate 100 mg in the Treatment of Severe Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety Comparison of Adapalene 0.1% / Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5% Gel Associated With Doxycycline Hyclate 100 mg Tablets Versus Adapalene 0.1% / Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5% Vehicle Gel Associated With Doxycycline Hyclate 100 mg Tablets in the Treatment of Severe Acne Vulgaris.

interventions.name: Adapalene BPO Gel associated with Doxycyline Hyclate
Vehicle Gel associated with Doxycycline Hyclate

summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the efficacy of Adapalene 0.1% / Benzoyl Peroxide (quoted as BPO) 2.5% Gel associated with Doxycycline Hyclate 100 mg Tablets compared to Adapalene 0.1% /Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5% Vehicle Gel associated with Doxycycline Hyclate 100 mg Tablets, in the treatment of severe acne vulgaris. The safety of the two treatment regimens will also be evaluated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Total Lesion Counts at Week 12.
